name: Last Point
description:
The galaxy is in danger. You must complete your mission in the Jyris System to save it. We count on you, good luck.

Last Point is a narrative game driven by exploration.

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Interact: Space

Last Point was made for the Ludum Dare 50, with theme “Delay the inevitable”.

Fonts: Oswald, Born2bSporty, ldcBlackRound
